title: Cardi B twerks it up in Turks and Caicos for 27th birthday
text:
Cardi B knows how to turn all the way up (Picture: Instagram, iamcardib)

Cardi B is taking Turks and Caicos by storm this week and wasted no time in showing off her twerking skills to celebrate her 27th birthday.

The Bodak Yellow rapper jetted off to the exotic Caribbean island last weekend with her husband Offset and a group of friends to help ring in her special day.

Things got a little steamy late on Sunday night when Cardi took a dip in the pool purely to film an Instagram story video of her twerking.

Likely filmed by her hubby, Cardi is seen showing off her saucy dance moves to the beat of Tee Grizzley and Offset’s song Pray For The Drip.

After a wild night of partying, the I Like It rapper took a moment to admire the beautiful moonlight in the early hours while delivering a philosophical speech for her followers.

In typical Cardi style, of course.

‘This is deada*s the moon shining real bright. It’s not even the sun, it’s deada*s the moon and it’s been like this all night long,’ Cardi mused.

‘This s**t is just inspiring it’s like seeing it just give you some type of chill in your body like some good s**t is going to happen.

‘I don’t know if God is connected to Earth energy but I’m just feeling this great energy. Maybe this is a message. It’s a blessing my n***a.’

We hear you, Cardi.

Over the weekend, Migos rapper Offset surprised his wife of two years with possibly the largest diamond ring known to man.

Designed by Pristine Jewelers, Offset gifted Cardi with the Titanic heart diamond ring set with a band of, yes, more diamonds.

And it’s truly a sight to behold.

Although she’s clearly having the time of her life, Cardi is still thinking of her number one pride and joy – baby Kulture.

The rapper shared a cute photo of the one-year-old and admitted: ‘Missing my baby.’

We’re living vicariously through you, Cardi.
